item.title: Mc Island [Rs Server progress] [Last Topic update: 25 Aug] video
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

Hey mps ;D long time no seek ;D
I see new advances in server.
I thought of few things, like:

  1. Adding ancient curses, not all of them, cause like summoning stuff isn’t in the server ;D
  2. Adding randoms while doing any skill, i could work out few things and send you the code ;D first decide what to do and stuff ;D
  3. Adding new NPC in to the game that drop new items, like dagon hai monks and elite BK’s ;D

few questions now:

  1. When woodcutting/mining delay timer gets lower each level?
  2. Does trees disappear after cutting them? same to mining?
  3. What about barrows? is it new school, dig - kill - open chest or old school, kill - take the drop?
  4. Pest control reward interface? Custom or old school? ;D
  5. Did you added poison effect?
  6. What about Boss NPC’s and their models? new or old ?
  7. Boss NPC attacks, such as KBD poison, fire and ice attacks?

That’s all for now ;D
If that’s not done yet i think we can riddle this out ;D

Read full topic
